title: Ethitha Veetu Kaliflowera Lyrics Raja Mandhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Ethitha Veetu Kaliflowera Song Lyrics
Singer(s):A.C.S. Ravichandran
Lyrics: Justin Prabhakaran

Ethitha Veetu Kaliflowere
enna kadhalikka porandha
en lover-u

kilakkae pogum
en rayilae.
padhinaaru vayadhinil
aaguraney
amul tinnu
paal bannu
tea kadayaa manasa
aathuriyae.

Ethitha Veetu Kaliflowere
enna kadhalikka porandha
en lover-u

goli soda neethaan
openeru naanthaan.
enna yaeppam poduthey
kadhalu.

kaali bottle naanthaan
cooling water neethaan
rendum kalandhaa
adangum en thaagamey.

jallikattu pola enna
thalli vittu poravalaey
vaadi,
unna katti adakkuven
naaney.
oru maanu konjam
valanji kodukkalaamey

goods vandi neethaan
thandavaalam naanthaan
nenjil thadaku thadakkunu
aadura.

operator naanthaan
toorin talkies neethaan
mohan paattapottu
mugam kaattuva.

naal kurichi natchadhiram
paakka sollu ungappanathaan.
aaaththaa kovilula
thaali katta readyaa
neeyum readyaa

Ethitha Veetu Kaliflowere
enna kadhalikka porandha
en lover-u
